name: Root'in for Loot'in
description:
A small game jam game! The game was made by two developers, myself and Vivi.

The theme was "roots", however, we were organisers for the Jam in our region and only started working on the game on the second day. 

There are PLENTY of bugs and issues. 

Play as a "Root'in" and "Toot'in" pirate on a quest for the legendary rootbeer.
